review: easy to set up and install.  i am able to access all of my amazon prime music as well as the instant video without problems.
author: 02mopar

review: The stick we have from HSN works just a good and was half the price
author: lost_hoosier

review: I love it, but It has a few problems.1. It does not work with my laptop2. The extender was broken when I got it. Not all the ports were there.3. It heats (really hot) extremely fast.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Unlike the Roku Streaming Stick, Fire TV Stick remembers your network password, so it is easy to take it to a friends house and bring it back without entering the passwords again.
author: Peter Skaates

review: Great product! Now we have netflix, hulu, amazon prime video, HBOgo and sling tv all in one device. Works very well and is very easy to use.
author: misssquerty

review: easy to install and use....great product
author: vincent L.
